Trust & Safety charter focuses on reducing the risk that users will be exposed to harm, fraud, or other behaviors outside community guidelines. The T&S Engineering team builds multi-tenant platform capabilities which tackle fraud and abuse problems affecting multiple verticals in the Swiggy ecosystem (Customers, Restaurants, Delivery agents, etc). We leverage machine learning models, rule engine capabilities, graph mapping, anomaly models and more to identify and take action on fraudulent behaviors. subtitle: Location - Bangalore, Karnataka, India, Work Type: Full Time
content:
ABOUT THE TEAM & ROLE:

The Marketplace Fulfilment Platform (MFP) team consists of Swiggy’s Core Logistics/Delivery, driver experience and CRM stacks. The charter of this team is to build a multi-tenant delivery platform that can seamlessly onboard multiple different businesses. The platform would need to maximise fleet efficiency across the various businesses. Additionally, the platform would allow third party Driver firms to onboard, while maintaining capacity across the various fleets, determine pSLA promises and assignment across various multi-modal fleets and support pluggable inclusion and exclusion rules to allow matching of orders to drivers.

The Driver Lifecycle Management (DLM) team is responsible for the solutions that meet the needs of the lakhs of driver partners that Swiggy has, including onboarding of drivers, contextual training, profiling, attrition prediction and intervention, governance modules, profiling and tiering and the base platforms for aggregation of signals, nudges to drivers to drive the right behaviors and low latency assistance flows to help the driver deal with exceptional scenarios that they may face in the order journey. The solutions created by the DLM team also need to be multi-tenant to support multiple business lines in Swiggy.

The driver experience team builds solutions across multiple domains including

Sourcing and onboarding, Delivery Partner Entity and Lifecycle management for our delivery partners to deliver a great DX while making sure, no one is able to abuse our platforms.

Contextual Training and Performance management platform to help our delivery partners grow in their roles by nudging them in real time on what should / shouldn’t be done, which directly or indirectly affects their earnings. This platform also enables us to rollout gamification / experiments to keep DE’s engaged and help reduce DE attrition.

Profiling / Tiering platform will build delivery partner segmentation across multiple attributes like tenure, rating, churn predictions, area familiarity, customer experience delivered, propensity to defraud / abuse the platform and more. Multiple products across Swiggy like Assignments, Mobilisation, Payouts will leverage these signals to solve complicated problems like what DEs to assign to a priority customer or to a customer who is on the verge of churning from the platform, what / how many de’s to mobilise across zones factoring in the conversion by segment, DE’s delivering a great customer experience are rewarded over and above, and more.

Governance platform to monitor all interactions between the DE and the customer, restaurant and Swiggy and act on the DEs basis rules configured either on some real time signals like abuse reported by a customer or aggregated data over time like x post pickup cancellations over a week. The actions taken can range from notifying the DEs on potential actions that can be taken to imposing monetary penalties to terminating them from the platform. Another challenge in this problem domain is to solve for attribution that is to reduce the false positives while providing strong redressal mechanisms.

Assistance platform for our delivery partners to get their queries resolved in real time, enabling our delivery partners to deliver a great customer experience.

Forecasting and Mobilization We take in demand (number of orders) predictions for a city, zone, time slot and build products to mobilize (delivery partner) supply on the ground. These include products that solve for long term mobilization (Hiring, Hiring Freeze), medium term mobilization (Slot Signup, Slot Tracker, Slot Compliance) and immediate mobilization (Dynamic Surges, Rain Surges, Nudges/Communication). Under supply and over supply are both equally bad for our business and hence the challenge here is accuracy and how quickly are we able to react to on ground situations (delta in demand and supply).

title: saavn - Tech Lead, Web
subtitle: Location - Mumbai, India, INDIA, Work Type: Full Time
content:
JOB TITLE: Tech Lead, Web

LOCATION: Mumbai, India

OUR STORY:

JioSaavn is South Asia’s leading music streaming service. We are over 300 entrepreneurs, across New York, California, Mumbai, Gurgaon, and Bangalore, who help music lovers access, discover, and listen to their favourite songs across languages and genres. In early 2018, a merger between JioMusic and Saavn was announced; creating a combined entity valued at over $1 billion.

We blend digital technology, data analysis (which we have affectionately coined Music Science), and a strong, fearless business acumen to reach all corners of the globe. Through partnerships with Apple, Google, Amazon, Facebook, Twitter and Shazam - to name a few - JioSaavn reaches more music fans across the world. Our award-winning mobile products, partnerships, innovations and thought leadership have been featured in some of the world’s leading publications, from The New York Times, to The Wall Street Journal, The Economic Times to Forbes, and many more. We are well-funded by some of the world’s most successful institutional investors and global media companies as well as a number of strategic individuals. Beyond investing, they are advisors and supporters of our vision, our passion, and our collective ability to deliver a revolutionary music experience as the leader in India.

OUR CULTURE:

At JioSaavn, we ignite passion and performance to work towards a collective goal: creating the perfect mobile entertainment ecosystem that delivers the best possible music experience to millions of listeners around the world. Our default mode is that of perpetual innovation. Together, we form a concerted rhythm that goes beyond borders. We don't just go with the flow, we create it.

JioSaavn offers a dynamic and unconventional work environment, full of fun wholesome experiences – from in-office performances by some of the world’s most beloved musicians to opportunities for international travel. We believe creativity and technology blend together like sweet melodies. When you choose JioSaavn, you join a diverse world of high-calibre techies, artists, and inventors hailing from companies like Yahoo!, Twitter, LinkedIn, Google, Qualcomm, HBO, Microsoft, Flipkart, Amazon, Paytm, Quikr, MSN, and NDTV. We are one of the few digital companies to provide employment opportunities that meet the Silicon Valley benchmark – right here in Mumbai! Figures, since we’ve got Silicon Valley covered, too.

Our value-based, people-first work culture is about empowering every individual in our global team to be catalysts for change in this dynamic digital world. Every day is an opportunity to bring your vision to life, and to expand, learn and grow. No idea is left unconsidered. No voice is left unheard.

With listeners speaking multiple languages in almost every country in the world, we like to think we have the most diverse user base on the planet. This has only been made possible because of the value we place on radical inclusivity in our offices across the globe. We believe different is wonderful, and what sets us apart is also what brings us closer. JioSaavn prides itself on being an equal opportunity employer. We have committed ourselves to creating a safe environment with fair and equal access and opportunities, sans discrimination. We encourage everyone to be open to experiences and perspectives beyond their normal; divergent thinkers create differentiated products, and even better music.

If our vibe matches with yours, we'd love to hear from you.

ROLE:

The role will be responsible for developing strategic partnerships in the external ecosystem, which will help us dramatically scale our B2B business. You will focus on partnerships with select verticals including Global Telecoms, Ecommerce platforms, Travel, Consumer Electronic and Mobile OEM partners. You are expected to independently drive this charter, come up with new constructs as well as drive commercial discussions to conclusion. This will also involve implementing the objective of partnership, closely working with senior stakeholders from product, tech and marketing.

RESPONSIBILITES:

  • Write maintainable/scalable/efficient code.
  • Design and architect scalable solutions for the business problems.
  • Work in a cross-functional team, collaborating with peers, being responsible for end to end deliveries
  • Measure, analyze and improve existing systems to enhance performance and functionality
  • Mentor junior members of the team

REQUIREMENTS:

  • Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field from a reputed college (The CS degree is a good to have but should not be a requirement. Relevant experience in the same field can also count towards eligibility)
  • 6+ years’ experience in building highly scalable applications
  • Strong CS fundamentals, problem solving skills, data structures and algorithms
  • Experience with leading projects in system design, architecture and technology selection
  • Very good understanding of web technologies, experience in modern frameworks likeReact is a plus
  • Experience in microservices architecture is a plus
  • You are comfortable working with a dynamic team with rapidly shifting priorities
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills

BENEFITS AND PERKS:

At JioSaavn, we blur work and play, and you get all the perks of a global company. You will get to work with a dynamic group of entrepreneurs, who are delivering results and working zealously across time zones to make a difference in the way the world experiences music. We love what we do, and we think you will too.

  • Group Mediclaim
  • Fun Fridays
  • Flexible vacation policies
  • Free healthy (and unhealthy) lunches & snacks
  • JioSaavn-sponsored team outings

content:
JOB TITLE: ASSOCIATE – AD OPERATIONS

LOCATION: GURGAON / MUMBAI, INDIA

OUR STORY:

JioSaavn is South Asia’s leading music streaming service. We are over 300 entrepreneurs, across New York, California, Mumbai, Gurgaon, and Bangalore, who help music lovers access, discover, and listen to their favorite songs across languages and genres. In early 2018, a merger between JioMusic and Saavn was announced; creating a combined entity valued at over $1 billion.

We blend digital technology, data analysis (which we have affectionately coined Music Science), and a strong, fearless business acumen to reach all corners of the globe. Through partnerships with Apple, Google, Amazon, Facebook, Twitter and Shazam - to name a few - JioSaavn reaches more music fans across the world. Our award-winning mobile products, partnerships, innovations and thought leadership have been featured in some of the world’s leading publications, from The New York Times, to The Wall Street Journal, The Economic Times to Forbes, and many more. We are well-funded by some of the world’s most successful institutional investors and global media companies as well as a number of strategic individuals. Beyond investing, they are advisors and supporters of our vision, our passion, and our collective ability to deliver a revolutionary music experience as the leader in India.

OUR CULTURE:

At JioSaavn, we ignite passion and performance to work towards a collective goal: creating the perfect mobile entertainment ecosystem that delivers the best possible music experience to millions of listeners around the world. Our default mode is that of perpetual innovation. Together, we form a concerted rhythm that goes beyond borders. We don't just go with the flow, we create it.

JioSaavn offers a dynamic and unconventional work environment, full of fun wholesome experiences – from in-office performances by some of the world’s most beloved musicians to opportunities for international travel. We believe creativity and technology blend together like sweet melodies. When you choose JioSaavn, you join a diverse world of high-calibre techies, artists, and inventors hailing from companies like Yahoo!, Twitter, LinkedIn, Google, Qualcomm, HBO, Microsoft, Flipkart, Amazon, Paytm, Quikr, MSN, and NDTV. We are one of the few digital companies to provide employment opportunities that meet the Silicon Valley benchmark – right here in Mumbai! Figures, since we’ve got Silicon Valley covered, too.

Our value-based, people-first work culture is about empowering every individual in our global team to be catalysts for change in this dynamic digital world. Every day is an opportunity to bring your vision to life, and to expand, learn and grow. No idea is left unconsidered. No voice is left unheard.

With listeners speaking multiple languages in almost every country in the world, we like to think we have the most diverse user base on the planet. This has only been made possible because of the value we place on radical inclusivity in our offices across the globe. We believe different is wonderful, and what sets us apart is also what brings us closer. JioSaavn prides itself on being an equal opportunity employer. We have committed ourselves to creating a safe environment with fair and equal access and opportunities, sans discrimination. We encourage everyone to be open to experiences and perspectives beyond their normal; divergent thinkers create differentiated products, and even better music.

If our vibe matches with yours, we'd love to hear from you.

RESPONSIBILITES:

Strategic Campaign Management and Analysis (60%)

  • Understand Advertising ecosystem especially, Digital Audio advertising
  • Setup campaigns using an intuitive proprietary interface and Google Ad Manager
  • Ensure campaigns meet delivery and performance goals.
  • Coming up with ideas and actionable insights
  • Testing different hypothesis to improve performance of campaigns
  • Being able to analyze graphs, charts, trends, dashboards and large amounts of data
  • Manage escalations and communications between stakeholders with respect to campaigns
  • QA and troubleshooting of campaign related problems
  • Daily liaison with Account Managers to ensure smooth progression of ad campaigns
  • Think like a client or media planner

Reporting and Analysis (30%)

  • Analyzing campaign performance(s)
  • Producing a variety of analytical and performance reports
  • Provide weekly/monthly updates and find ways to automate these
  • Providing feedback to sales person as to campaign performance(s)

Testing: (10%)

  • Help with various tests and provide unbiased feedback to the product/tech teams.
  • Utilize data and dashboards to understand system and campaign health

Requirements for candidate:

  • Basic knowledge of digital advertising metrics including measurement and general KPIs
  • Very good knowledge of Excel and data analysis
  • Very good communication skills - ability to communicate problems, solutions and ideas.
  • Ability to visualize information and look at charts, graphs to draw insights and identify patterns
  • Have an understanding of media planning in the digital advertising space and client requirements
  • Previous campaign management experience is a big plus

BENEFITS AND PERKS:

At JioSaavn, we blur work and play, and you get all the perks of a global company. You will get to work with a dynamic group of entrepreneurs, who are delivering results and working zealously across time zones to make a difference in the way the world experiences music. We love what we do, and we think you will too.

  • Group Mediclaim
  • Fun Fridays
  • Flexible vacation policies
  • Free healthy (and unhealthy) lunches & snacks
  • JioSaavn-sponsored team outings
Apply

MediBuddy is India’s number 1, ISO Certified Medical App that lets one consult Specialist Doctors 24X7 over a tele, video call or even a chat within 30 minutes. It is the award-winning technology platform that transforms the health insurance industry at the very core. MediBuddy, with its diverse offerings for various stakeholders of the health benefits industry, makes the process of discovering, accessing, utilizing and monitoring health benefits seamless and real-time. It is built in an integrated platform for online consultation, ordering medicines & booking lab tests, managing insurance covers etc. With over 6 Million+ Indian users, 5000+ MD Doctors, funding from Bessemer venture partners, Rebright partners and other investors, MediBuddy is scaling rapidly in its quest to help millions more.

MediBuddy provides consultation services for patients of all age groups in several key medical, disciplines such as dermatology, gynaecology, sexology, paediatrics, general medicine, psychiatry,weight management etc. Every user can avail transparent, tech-enabled, round-the-clock and multi-language services. Also, ordering medicines and booking lab tests is only a click away for all our customers!

“MediClinic” is our very own OPD services with 300+ clinics across India to support immediate wellness or medical needs of our customers. With the recent pandemic, MediBuddy has been instrumental in helping multiple corporates to get back to workplace with right safety norms.

content:

Who we hire: Who is likely to succeed here

Our best hires are,

  • not looking for a new job, but a new challenge
  • unafraid to start from scratch and learn things
  • empathetic and kind to customers & colleagues

They also likely,

  • have started stuff (startups, projects, communities)
  • are living their passion (code, design, marketing), and
  • have a well thought out perspective on their work

If that sounds like you, then we should talk.

NOTE: we love interesting conversations with passionate people, but we also won’t string you along for months on end. It’s either a HELL YES or a no from us. ++ You can expect cakes and cookies in the mail.

About the role: Head of Creative - Brand Design

The ‘Head of Creative’ role was conceived to help us engage with prospects and customers more meaningfully across mediums.

It will generally involve working with designers, animators, copywriters, and growth marketers to solve a stated problem like,

  • How can we accelerate sales opportunities (they need us, they love us, but how can we get them off their behinds to use us)?
  • How can we increase adoption for Vymo (how can we communicate to people who have always viewed tech with suspicion)?
  • How do we increase conversions on campaigns (are we saying the right things well enough to move CXOs to action)?
  • How can we hire the best engineers (inspiring love for the kind of work we do and who we are without offering BMW bikes)?
  • How can we fight fatigue and burnout (engaging 300+ people remotely and recreating the visceral energy of the office floor)?

You get the drift.

We believe putting shapes and figures together on a beautiful, compelling interface is the lowest resolution of a design solution, much less a creative one.

We like Alchemy.

That is Part I.

The second, and wholly important part is marshalling the people and resources at your disposal to create this alchemy.

You will have to,

  • Work with Growth, Customer Success, HR, and other teams to align their operational requirements into something more strategic. Nobody just needs banners.
  • Define the vision for your team and help them do the best work of their life. This involves getting rid of ambiguity, and investing in their growth.
  • Discover our brand ground up and figure how to best represent us. This will involve actually understanding users, customers, employees, investors, and other stakeholders.
  • Translate our brand values and aesthetics to EVERYTHING. Processes, templates, guidelines, workshops and whatever else is required to make sure we’re pixel perfect.
  • Help the function evolve from support to strategy. That means defining work proactively for your team and function, building for scale and moving the needle.

OK, but what will I build?

  • Design language & systems: that can help the team ship high quality work in a predictable way while striving for truly global benchmarks.
  • Product marketing collateral: decks, docs, web pages, films explaining our value proposition to diverse audiences across 6 different geographies
  • Brand communication: communicating Vymo’s values via different mediums to customers, employees, investors, and other stakeholders.

Does all of this sound way too exciting for a B2B company?

A B2B Company

That’s because we are NOT a conventional B2B company. Over the last 7 years, we have reinvented every B2B tenet worth revisiting, including and not limited to:

  • Enterprise software is not built for user love: our daily adoption is 2.5x average
  • Cannot close 7 figure deals out of India: we have large customers in 6 countries
  • B2B marketing is about decks & booths: we make art, films, and craft experiences.

So, we don’t consider Design or Creative a support function. We believe Creative is integral to crafting experiences that move people to action.

Because, even B2B companies work with people.

You have to work harder to understand our context. It may not be as simple as understanding why people buy sugary drinks or suits and ties. But, decisions are made by people with flesh and blood, and not insular, inanimate organizations.

Solve higher-order problems.

Is this right for you? Let’s see...

We don’t believe we’re right for everyone. We have made enough mistakes to understand what works for us and most importantly, what doesn’t.

If you’re reading this, it’s because your profile reflects the qualities we see in a potential hire. We’re approaching this role purely as an outbound activity.

You must necessarily have,

  • 6-10 years of experience leading Creative teams
  • strong design fundamentals across mediums
  • built teams, processes, and brands from scratch

If that’s not you, then we apologize for wasting your time. 🙏🏽

Also, we need someone with a strong perspective, but you must marry that with the necessary curiosity and humility to discover our brand and do what’s right for us. We don’t want you transposing what you’ve done before in our context.

Further, you must want to,

  • really understand our product and market, even the “boring” bits
  • be a manager and coach and set the north star for our people
  • commit to a five year journey from hereon to IPO and beyond

If you are not in that mindspace right now then this won’t work out.

You can’t want this passively. It will have to consume you.

You will be spending a significant portion of your waking hours thinking about our mission. You will have to obsess about what we can do better each day.

We understand that this kind of commitment doesn’t happen overnight, but you must be willing to invest in the process at least. Because, we will. 100%.

The Hiring Process: ~2 weeks

Culture Fit / Are we right for each other?

  • 1:1 30 min open ended chat with VP-Marketing
  • Purpose is to understand each others’ aspirations, and
  • If we have the right vibe together

Copy Aesthetics & Fundamentals - I

  • Assignment to solve for a copy problem
  • Benchmarks of what you think is amazing
  • How it could be relevant for Vymo today

Content Aesthetics & Fundamentals - II

  • Post assignment discussion with the team
  • Educate us about your thought process
  • How will this fit in our scheme of things

Coaching & Enablement

  • 1:1 60 min discussion with managers
  • How will you enable our team to be 10x better
  • How do you see our future evolving

Culture Fit / How will we work together

  • 30 min with the Marketing team @ Vymo
  • How will your next 30 - 60 - 90 days look
  • What do you need to be truly successful

Why join Vymo? Why now

  • Start with a blank page, quite literally: your opportunity to revisit conventions, reinvent what is necessary to build things ground up.
  • Ground zero, scaling a SaaS unicorn: do what it takes to move the needle and scale the next SAAS unicorn, have a story to tell

  • Complete ownership, no half-measures: own your work, end to end, from concept to execution with minimal intervention from anyone.
  • Enjoy a truly diverse, global culture: we’re spread across continents and are a melting pot of cultures; become a richer version of you

    • Open CRs/Bugs – status, plans & prioritization;
    • Performance review – adoption/engagement, activities/outcomes, outliers & other actionable insights, next steps;
    • Client business-related developments and related strategic initiatives planned by the client and by extension, expectations from Vymo in the coming months;
    • Observed feature gaps & related notional loss for the client and related next steps;
    • New features launched & potential value for the client and actions thereof;
    • Scheduling & running regular governance meetings – SteerCos, QBRs;
    • User NPS scores/planned actions for improving the same; support required from the client;
    • User engagement access/feedback – FGDs, interviews, 1:1 with hero users/nonusers;
    • Executing renewals playbook & supporting sales and other leadership team in this regard.
  • Update the tool, ‘ChurnZero’ for all your clients facing engagements and tasks emanating from such engagements; assign responsibilities to relevant people internally for actions to be delivered by them.

  • Review progress against monthly sprint plans prepared by the Service Delivery team to deliver the client asks for the given month, as agreed with the client as above.
  • Periodically engage with users, managers of your clients to enable the following:
    • Understand their immediate priorities and assess how Vymo could help them with those;
    • Understand their underlying reasons for using/not using Vymo and assess interventions needed to successfully address their concerns;
    • Demonstrate to them how Vymo could make their lives simpler and the value we could add to them on account of the data-driven insights generated by Vymo.
  • For new clients, use our “Success Roadmap Framework” to help build a bespoke “Success Roadmap” that outlines the key success metrics that both parties mutually agree to jointly drive during each stage of the client onboarding lifecycle.
  • As part of the periodic engagement with clients, revisit the success metrics agreed at inception to refine and align them to extant business priorities of the client for the upcoming quarter. Ensure the necessary alignment of deliverables at our end to successfully deliver on the revised focus areas/metrics.
  • Introduce new product features launched by Vymo to your clients and generate awareness and interest amongst them to adopt these new features.
  • You are not responsible for cross-selling and up-sell into your client account, but for identifying such opportunities and passing them over to the Sales team who would take them forward. For e.g. additional distribution channels or other processes that can be supported by Vymo and are currently not part of our solution.
  • Support the Marketing team in arranging for any surveys, references, testimonials required by them and/or getting speakers from the client organizations for client events

What you would have done

  • MBA from a premier institute, Graduation in Engineering/Business
  • Have 12+ years of work experience in high touch customer-facing roles such as Customer Success, Account Management, Strategy Consulting, and/or SaaS/Enterprise Software companies
  • Have experience in engaging with senior stakeholders. Equally at ease in dealing effectively with end-users, managers, project SPOCs & business sponsors and building a rapport with them
  • Have the ability to communicate clearly and effectively with executive-level sponsors as well as technical practitioners
  • Have experience of navigating a start-up ecosystem - externally and internally and is a self-motivated team player
  • Have strong empathy for customers and a passion for customer’s success, takes a data-driven approach towards customer adoption & managing success through outcomes
  • Exceptional Account Management, organizational, consulting, project management and interpersonal skills
  • Consistent record as a top performer in a customer-facing role and have met or exceeded customer retention goals and applicable success metrics
  • Have experience in handling challenging situations and clients and demonstrated capabilities in winning them over.
Apply

Vymo is the distribution excellence cloud trusted by over 125,000users across 60+ leading enterprises such as AXA, Allianz, Generali, AIA, and more. A Gartner ‘Cool Vendor’, Vymo is funded by Emergence Capital & Sequoia Capital. The company has seen 3x YoY growth over the last few years and aspires to do even better this year by building up a truly global and diverse team.

What is the Personal Sales Assistant - A game-changer!

We thrive in the CRM space where every company struggles to deliver meaningful engagement & contextual analytics to their Sales teams. But even the best CRMs in the world have an adoption rate of less than 30%. Vymo was engineered with a mobile-first philosophy to help remote sales teams operate more efficiently in a deskless environment. With its powerful intelligence engine, the platform captures sales activities automatically and learns how to make Sales Representatives more productive through nudges and suggestions on a mobile device. That’s why over 85% of salespeople use Vymo daily. Watch Vymo in action - https://youtu.be/9saePnvir4M

What you will do

As a Customer Success Manager, you would be directly responsible for driving customer delight and value across the key accounts assigned to you. You will build & nurture strong and trusted advisor relationships with a key client project and business stakeholders/sponsors. You will be the SPOC/interface with the client and as such internally represent the customer’s voice to us. You will be supported by the entire delivery organization and leadership team to successfully deliver upon your key KPIs, which include:

  • High NPS/CSAT score – NPS > 40, CSAT > 8/10
  • Logo & Gross MRR Churn – less than 10% attrition in MRR across the portfolio
  • Net Retention – 150% of MRR across the portfolio (net expansion in user base)
  • Customer advocacy – references, testimonials, referrals from clients
  • Driving timely delivery of client asks/requirements – working closely with the delivery organization

A Day in your Life

  • Engage with Project SPOCs and Business Sponsors at client organizations on various aspects, including but not limited to:
    • Open CRs/Bugs – status, plans & prioritization;
    • Performance review – adoption/engagement, activities/outcomes, outliers & other actionable insights, next steps;
    • Client business-related developments and related strategic initiatives planned by the client and by extension, expectations from Vymo in the coming months;
    • Observed feature gaps & related notional loss for the client and related next steps;
    • New features launched & potential value for the client and actions thereof;
    • Scheduling & running regular governance meetings – SteerCos, QBRs;
    • User NPS scores/planned actions for improving the same; support required from the client;
    • User engagement access/feedback – FGDs, interviews, 1:1 with hero users/nonusers;
    • Executing renewals playbook & supporting sales and other leadership team in this regard.
  • Update the tool, ‘ChurnZero’ for all your clients facing engagements and tasks emanating from such engagements; assign responsibilities to relevant people internally for actions to be delivered by them.
  • Schedule and run internal cadence calls with the cross-functional team supporting your client accounts (Delivery Manager, Solution Specialist, Developers, QA) sharing the necessary insights/feedback from client discussions, especially agreed items to be delivered in the coming months (Client Delivery Plan)
  • Review progress against monthly sprint plans prepared by the Service Delivery team to deliver the client asks for the given month, as agreed with the client as above.
  • Periodically engage with users, managers of your clients to enable the following:
    • Understand their immediate priorities and assess how Vymo could help them with those;
    • Understand their underlying reasons for using/not using Vymo and assess interventions needed to successfully address their concerns;
    • Demonstrate to them how Vymo could make their lives simpler and the value we could add to them on account of the data-driven insights generated by Vymo.
  • For new clients, use our “Success Roadmap Framework” to help build a bespoke “Success Roadmap” that outlines the key success metrics that both parties mutually agree to jointly drive during each stage of the client onboarding lifecycle.
  • As part of the periodic engagement with clients, revisit the success metrics agreed at inception to refine and align them to extant business priorities of the client for the upcoming quarter. Ensure the necessary alignment of deliverables at our end to successfully deliver on the revised focus areas/metrics.
  • Introduce new product features launched by Vymo to your clients and generate awareness and interest amongst them to adopt these new features.
  • You are not responsible for cross-selling and up-sell into your client account, but for identifying such opportunities and passing them over to the Sales team who would take them forward. For e.g. additional distribution channels or other processes that can be supported by Vymo and are currently not part of our solution.

  • Have experience of navigating a start-up ecosystem - externally and internally and is a self-motivated team player

We now look to you to persuade UrbanPiper leadership that you are the right person to lead the initiative. ● Introduce yourself to the panel with a brief professional journey (5 mins) ○ What is your relevant work experience to date? ○ What have you built/achieved that’s most surprising in it’s combination of creativity + speed of execution (we welcome answers that don’t relate to sales) ○ To be successful in this role, it may well require more hard work and dedication than anything you’ve done before. Why do you want to do this? ● Customer profiling (15 mins) ○ What are 3 different types of ideal customer profile (ICP) for UrbanPiper (be specific in your criteria)? ○ How does our value proposition to them differ? ○ Conduct an interview with 3 restaurateurs, ideally with each one representing one of the ICP’s you’ve identified. (15 mins) Task 2 (10 mins): Enlighten us with your biggest passion in life - take any one topic that is closest to your heart and go deep into it. This could be a hobby, sport, or a social cause you feel the most about. Please share the solution with your recruiter in a shareable format using Google Docs, optimized to be presented to a panel in 1 hour. This exercise is intentionally ambiguous and we suggest that you explicitly define your assumptions. The team will review your case study and if successful, invite you to present it live.

We at Unbox Robotics are revolutionizing warehouses and distribution centers by building the world's most compact, powerful, and flexible mobile robotics systems for the new age of warehousing. Our product is the World's 1st of its kind AI-powered parcel sorting robotic system that gets installed 10X faster, saves 50+% space and improves productivity by more than 3X with 50% fewer robots than that of the competition. Purpose:

Systems Engineering is a cross-functional engineering team that is responsible for planning and execution of design and development processes. This team will work along with hardware and software teams to generate the system level requirements. Systems engineering team is also responsible to plan and execute integration and testing activities to ensure that the systems meet the performance metrics.

In this team you will be working with various systems and subsystems like sensing and actuation systems that would be critical in the robots and robotic systems for automating the warehouse operations.

Department

Systems Engineering

  • Reviews, changes or upgrades to existing tests, tools, and testing protocols.
  • Provide technical support for product development teams as needed.
  • Proficiency in JIRA or any equivalent tool. Work in a dynamic Scrum based environment.
  • Travel to customer sites and collaborate with engineering and integration team members to troubleshoot and document existing systems.

Requirements:

  • Experience with motion control equipment, material handling systems, or robotics
  • Understanding of ROS with basic programming experience (C, C++ or python)
  • Experience in using CI/CD systems and version control eg. Git
  • Good knowledge of documentation and certification standards

  • Basic understanding of electro-mechanical systems
  • Experience in working with Robotic Systems

Eligible candidates:

  • B.E/B-tech in Electrical, Mechanical, Mechatronics or any related discipline

  • Research aptitude and relevant research experience.

  • Strong communication skills both oral and written at technical and management level.
  • Ability to communicate with customers to understand and document the simulation requirements, then ideate, plan, develop and deliver.

title: rivigo - Program Manager, Operation Excellence

About Rivigo

We are a technology-enabled company that is shaping the future of logistics for the world. Founded in 2014, we are transforming the sector with our global-first driver relay model made possible through a unique mix of next generation data science and operational excellence. Grounded in the mission of making logistics human, we have fundamentally changed the truck driver’s job from a ‘months-away-from-home’ job to a ‘day’ job. Unlike conventional truck drivers, relay pilots drive from pitstop to pitstop (under 300 kms) and return to their families the same day, thus, creating huge social dividend.

Relay trucking also ensures 50-70% reduction in turnaround time and highest reliability for clients, helping them reinvent their business models – serving new markets, reducing inventory and significantly cutting costs. Listed among the world’s top emerging businesses and backed by marquee investors, we are working on a vision to build a completely technology-enabled RaaS (Relay as a service) marketplace to define the way goods move on roads in India and the world.

  • Identifying, prioritizing and implementing initiatives to improve productivity, quality, customer service and/or reducing costs and complexity
  • Develop, implement and govern KPIs reporting for the portfolio of programs, providing visibility to the milestones and performance across all projects.
  • Develop and maintain operational excellence project plans, identify resource needs, and manage project schedule; collaborate effectively across teams to agree timelines and deliverable.  Continually challenge the status quo and persistently dig for improvement opportunities
  • Establish a passion for operational excellence within operations  Manage large highly complex programs that will accelerate operational, productivity and customer experience improvement across the organization.
  • Serve as facilitator and champion for operational excellence across the company. Coach, mentor and support colleagues in achievement of initiatives and targets.
  • Apply analytical expertise on operations to conceptualize projects, build stakeholder alignment, and drive projects to achieve strategic goals / rationalize cost & quality performance

Who we are looking for ?

  • Engineer/MBA with 2 - 4 years of experience in consulting, CI or Ops excellence role
  • Ability to influence stakeholders across the organization without direct reporting lines
  • Proven experience and knowledge of process improvement tools, methods, and techniques
  • Proven experience in driving continuous improvement initiatives
  • Substantial experience in program/project management or an equivalent operational role
  • Ability to interpret, analyse, and understand complex data sets

ABOUT PRISTYN CARE:

Pristyn Care has raised around $100 million in its Series E round, led by Sequoia Capital US, valuing it at $1.4 billion, adding to India's Unicorn count.

Pristyn Care is an asset light full-stack healthcare provider that rents spare OT capacity and surgical infrastructure of a hospital to perform surgeries for its own patients via Pristyn's full-time surgeons. We do elective procedures in Proctology, Laparoscopy, ENT, Gynaecology, Obstetrics & IVF, Urology, Vascular, Orthopedics, Ophthalmology, and Aesthetics. Pristyn Care has a team of high-quality surgeons, a tech-enabled patient acquisition engine, process-driven patient care, insurance clearance expertise and a network of Hospital partners with predictable OT availability. Founded by a team of ex-Max and Medanta doctors, and ex-UrbanClap and Mobikwik folk -Dr. Garima Sawhney, Dr. Vaibhav Kapoor and Harsimarbir Singh, we at Pristyn Care are disrupting the surgical ecosystem. In 5 years, we aim to be the largest distributed (full stack) surgery platform in India.

Pristyn Care, headquartered in Gurgaon, is operational since June 2018 and has since then expanded to 40+ cities across India. We are series E funded, led by Tiger Global, Epiq Capital. Sequoia Capital, Hummingbird Ventures and Greenoaks Capital are other key investors. With a team size of 1700+ people including 300+ surgeons, we are proud to have served more than 30,000 happy patients till now. Our surgeons are performing surgeries in 700+ hospitals pan India, including corporate hospitals. Pristyn care is among the esteemed list of official stakeholders with Swasth which has top 25 Indian startups along with best hospitals of India. Swasth's mission is to lay the foundation of a technology framework that will form a digital backbone for healthcare delivery in India (www.swasth.app). It aims to optimize hospital capacity by use of the latest digital technology.

Pristyn Care has also launched its own fitness and wellness brand named -beatXP. BeatXP is a wellness startup, founded in 2018 by Harsimarbir Singh, Dr Vaibhav Kapoor, and Dr Garima Sawhney, which was first launched with Pristyn Care brand name & then later on rebranded to beatXP in the year 2021.

beatXP aims to improve human lives with the help of technology and has introduced all necessary health monitoring devices such as BP Machine, Glucometer, weighing scale, thermometer, oximeter & many more to ensure all vital human body diagnostics cane be monitored easily anytime, anywhere from the comfort of their home. The Company believes in the motto “PREVENTION is better than CURE”, and human lives can easily be improved through good lifestyle & fitness habits. Company aims to launch premium quality fitness & wellness devices in the future with the sole aim to make human lives better & easier.

The Analytics Lead will lead the analytics & BI department and oversee the activities of a team of business analysts and work closely with the program management and strategy team. In this role, the Analytics Lead ensures that the business in its various departments understands and owns its own health, finds growth levers, and identifies opportunities for optimization. The Analytics Lead leads the business through all efforts that drive business performance and potential by using the existing and new data sources and techniques. The role will involve the Analytics Lead getting his or her hands dirty and solving hard analytical problems for the business, taking a seat at the table alongside Engineering, Product, Business, Category, and Marketing, in strategy and planning.

Segment-wise Descriptions for the role of -

1) Building and managing the entire analytics team

  • The Analytics Lead will play a leading strategic role to lead the data analytics and data warehousing departments in strategy development with regard to the collection, manipulation, and analysis of data for various business functions/departments such as marketing, sales, and operations, among others.
  • Ensure a capable team is aligned to and deployed against projects with the highest business impact
  • Help analysts and business intelligence engineers achieve their goals
  • Explain complicated stats or data technology concepts to them and train them to be high-impact analysts.

2) Drive technology requirements and investments that make analytics a strategic advantage for the company

  • Driving the day-to-day analytical approaches and exploring solutions to particular problems
  • Unified view of customer data across tools and services used by the business
  • Review and analyze the effectiveness and efficiency of existing systems and develop strategies for improving or further leveraging these systems.
  • Oversee the design and delivery of reports and insights that analyze business functions and key operations and performance metrics.
  • Anticipate future demands of initiatives related to people, technology, budget, and business within your team and design/implement solutions to meet these needs.
  • Organize and drive successful completion of data insight initiatives through effective management of analyst and data employees and effective collaboration with stakeholders.

3) Scaling and driving collaboration between teams to make everyone data-driven in their decision-making process

  • Works closely with leaders in establishing departmental goals and strategies in defining the data collection needs of the business for the purpose of future work and also for guaranteeing that there is high data quality and reliability across the business.
  • Build, develop and maintain data models, reporting systems, data automation systems, dashboards, and performance metrics support that support key business decisions, with a focus on functional growth
  • Collaborate with numerous departments across the business, aiding them in the proper use of data, hence, ensuring the delivery of desired operational results
  • Identify efficiencies in ways data is captured, validated, and organised.
  • Identify critical datasets required to support client understanding and digital activation, identifies gaps in existing datasets, and proactively mitigate
  • Anticipate future demands of initiatives related to people, technology, budget, and business within your department and design/implement solutions to meet these needs.

Qualifications for Analytics Lead

  • Working knowledge of data mining principles: predictive analytics, mapping, collecting data from multiple data systems
  • Strong SQL skills, ability to perform effective querying involving multiple tables and subqueries.
  • Understanding of and experience using analytical concepts and statistical techniques: hypothesis development, designing tests/experiments, analyzing data, drawing conclusions, and developing actionable recommendations for business units.
  • Experience and knowledge of statistical modeling techniques: GLM multiple regression, logistic regression, log-linear regression, variable selection, etc.
  • Experience writing advanced SAS code statements, models, and macros.
  • Experience working with and creating databases and dashboards using all relevant data to inform decisions.
  • Experience using analytics techniques to contribute to company growth efforts, increasing revenue, and other key business outcomes.
  • Strong problem solving, and quantitative and analytical abilities.
  • Strong ability to plan and manage numerous processes, people, and projects simultaneously.
  • Excellent communication, collaboration, and delegation skills.

The Information Security Officer will work closely with inefficient formulation, implementation, and management of the Bank's information security policy(s) and compliance programs. The incumbent will ensure efficient management of Information Security Governance, in line with the Reserve Bank of India and other statutory/regulatory bodies governing our India operations. He/she will also coordinate and execute the information security management system program (ISMS), Security operations, VAPT program, and Cyber Security Framework implementation. The job holder will also ensure that risk management needs in relation to information security, including but not limited to incident response, access control, business continuity and disaster recovery are duly and promptly addressed. This role requires extensive coordination and teamwork with inter and intra-department officials.

STRATEGIC

  • Responsible for all cyber security governance framework along with other activities related to information and cyber security aspects as per the directions from Group Chief Information Security Officer.
  • Contribute to the formulation of, annual strategies, policies, and procedures of the Information Security Section, to support divisional and organizational business strategy.
  • Ensure that the Information Security plans are within agreed budgets and timescales. Assist the Country Manager & Group Chief Information Security Officer in preparing/providing timely, accurate, and complete progress reports to the Management reviews, RBI, IBA, IDRBT, CERT-In, CSITE, etc.
  • Update self on the IT/security industry trends, new solutions, and techniques, as well as emerging threats and regulatory requirements/changes set by QCB and other relevant government bodies, and suggest adequate changes in the section, including but not limited to the staffing of employees, department deliverables, etc.
  • Develop and maintain robust working relationships with internal/external stakeholders to facilitate functional/operational/ strategic needs.
  • Develop and maintain various performance monitoring checklists as required by ISO27001 /RBI Cyber Security Framework for IT and other operations.
  • Is well versed in cyber security governance framework and responsible for managing RBI - CSITE advisories, circulars, policy development, security operation center (SOC), vulnerability assessment and penetration testing, etc.
  • Member of Bank’s India Management Committee where information security-related risks, gaps, and remedial measures are discussed and tabled.

Job Requirement

OPERATIONAL

  • Ensure successful execution of ISO27001 & PCI-DSS and other industry certifications and governance of the certification programs and reporting the progress to management
  • Perform gap analysis of business operation to ascertain the magnitude of results in terms of non-compliance by the business/support functions with the statutory and regulatory requirements.
  • Liaise with external consultants appointed from time to time in assessing the adequacy and effectiveness of the Bank's information security efforts.
  • Perform the Risk assessment which would include identification, assessment, monitoring, and reporting of key information security risks and preparing the mitigating controls. Regularly follow up with Operational departments such as IT and Admin on implementing the mitigating controls with appropriate escalation.
  • Review and follow-up of Compliance with time-to-time applicable laws and regulatory requirements, third-party partners.

  • Depict threats and mitigation options to executive management and preparation of periodic (applicable weekly/ monthly /quarterly) Dashboards, reports, memos, and agenda items for the Information Security council, Risk Management Committee, Audit Committee of the Board, and further compliance of directions.
  • Review all data being generated from periodic threat assessments and ensure maximum accuracy. Revalidate observations with technical stakeholders and ensure that the observations from periodic assessments are accurate and complained.
  • Collection and consolidation of data required for monthly /quarterly /Half-yearly/ yearly - Report submissions / any other compliance reports as required by RBI and its appointed organizations/entities.

content:
The world around us, as our eyes see it, is three dimensional. The world, however that we are shown via screens and use everyday to talk to our loved ones, work, shop and even entertain ourselves is almost unfairly still in two dimensions. Today, on the shoulders of giants, deep learning, computer vision, 3d graphics and computing horsepower have seen leaps like never before, and we believe the time to ubiquitously experience the world around us, in all the dimensions it has to offer is finally here!

About Avataar

Avataar is a Tiger Global and Sequoia Capital backed deep-tech 3D Computer Vision & AI startup. We are ambitious, long-term oriented and passionate about our work. We work with the state-of-the-art technology and closely partner with market leading industry platforms in AR/VR space like Facebook, Snapchat, Google and Samsung on the one hand, and with commerce thought leaders like Amazon and Target, who are enabling AR consumer journeys at scale and thus being in the flow of market leadership and playing shapers in their work is something that runs through our DNA. We work like an inspired, empowered, professional sports team, focused on winning at a global scale. We are always available for each other in the times of need, be it professional or personal and are player-coaches. We play for the front of the jersey, we debate and commit, and overcome setbacks through grit and passion, together. Most importantly, we consider themselves life-long learners in a big, ever changing diverse classroom.

About Avataar Reality Labs

At Avataar Reality labs, we are pushing the boundaries of what is possible in AR/VR and enabling the consumer shift to metaverse at scale. We are building the neural engine to empower the creation, rendering and manipulation of AR/XR content across devices. Our projects range from solutions to hard technical problems that significantly boost our current neural rendering engine, to much bolder endeavours that would fundamentally cause a paradigm shift in the way people create and consume content in the mixed-reality 3D world. If thinking about this herculean research and engineering adventure at the intersection of vision, deep learning, and graphics excites you, we can’t wait to have you on board!

What you will work on

You’ll be working closely with our research and backend teams to optimize and productionize ML models, as well as improve internal frameworks for increasing research and engineering productivity. The ideal candidate for this role has deep passion for frameworks, strong understanding of building robust and scalable software, and experience in optimizing ML models.

Job Requirements

What we look for:

  • Strong experience in architecting production-ready systems and performance optimization skills.
  • Strong programming skills and proficiency in Cuda, C++, Python and Pytorch

You will be a great fit in the team if:

  • You’ve got positive energy. You’re optimistic about the future and determined to get there

subtitle: Location - Remote, Work Type: Full Time
content:
About FamPay

FamPay is building India’s first neo-bank exclusively teens. FamPay helps teens make their own online and offline payments through UPI, FamPay App and FamCard. Our aim is to make banking cool for teens and to help them learn the value of money, savings and spending wisely. We are on a mission to raise a new, financially aware generation, and drive 250 Million+ Indian teenagers to kickstart their financial journey super early in their life.

Founded in 2019 by IIT Roorkee alumni, FamPay is backed by some of the most respected investors around the world like Elevation Capital, Y-Combinator, Sequoia Capital India, Venture Highway, Global Founder’s Capital and the likes of Kunal Shah, Amrish Rao as angels.

About this Role

We take our internship program very seriously and hope to get our future team members from among our interns. You can take up as challenging a work as you are capable of.

You will be the gatekeeper of FamPay's user's interaction. Your capabilities will define how our users will perceive our capabilities. We are looking for creators with obsessive need for visual and performance perfection, combined with high learning+implementation combo powers. The ones who iterate the script 100s of times, if required, to get that feature right.

Let's get on the rocketship together?

On the Job

  • Build and support FamPay android app
  • Take ownership for shipping features in android
  • Coordinate with product, design and backend to get things done
  • Being proactive in solving issues
  • Trying out new things that can help improve user experience

Requirements

  • B.Tech in computer science or equal work experience
  • Good programming and android fundamentals
  • Experience with reactive programming and paradigms
  • Experience with Firebase (messaging, analytics, crashlytics, remote-config, realtime database)
  • Good knowledge about the android build system
  • Basic knowledge of multi module architecture
  • Basic knowledge about programatically generated UI
  • Basic knowledge of android modern architecture
  • Basic Knowledge about deeplinking in android
  • Practical knowledge of Git - Went through app distribution process at least once
  • Well-versed with Software Development Life Cycle
  • Demonstrate the ability to be a self-starter and learn quickly
  • Excellent analytical and problem-solving skills
  • Passion for learning and implementing new technologies
  • Internship experience with top product-based startups/Contribution to GSOC or any other open source community would be a huge plus

Why should you join us?

Every once in a while, a product comes to life that makes people think, why was this not done earlier? The users love it, the investors dream about the great returns and the team feels the joy and pride every day. We have strong indicators for users & investors, and we are building a team that will have stories to tell all their life.

We believe that a great product is built by a high-quality team that finds purpose and joy in their work, and we also go beyond it to put heavy emphasis on having fun at work as well.

Perks

  • Competitive Stipend
  • Certificate and Letter of Recommendation
  • Subscriptions to premium platforms
  • Access to Mental Health professionals
  • Friendly leaves policy that’ll make your friends jealous
  • Flexible work schedule so you never miss brunch, lunch, or dinner plans
  • Chance to work full-time at FamPay

Know more about us!

First Payments App Exclusively for Teens in India

Before FamPay, the only experience teens could have with money was asking their parents for more. By allowing them to make and receive payments, track their transactions, build a savings streak, and earn exciting rewards, we are enabling them to finally start gaining financial autonomy.

India’s First Numberless Card

Sleek, black, and numberless, our FamCard is aesthetically on point and makes carrying your card around super secure.

India’s First Visa Card for Teens

The most personalized card ever with doodles on it! Making your own payments wherever you go is not only more convenient than ever but also in vogue

Trusted by Marquee Investors

We are backed by internationally acclaimed investors including Elevation Capital, Y-Combinator, Sequoia Capital India, Venture Highway, Global Founder’s Capital, and the likes of Kunal Shah, and Amrish Rao as angels.

LinkedIn Top Startups

We were one of LinkedIn’s Top 25 Startups for 2021. Valuing talent over degree and creating a people-first culture has its perks ;)

Check out what Life at Fam looks like!

title: vivriti - Principal Officer
subtitle: Location - Gandhinagar, Gujarat, India, Work Type: Full Time
content:
Who we are:

Vivriti is a young, dynamic, and spirited institution that boasts of a large appetite for success through its vision of creating the largest and most valuable platform for enterprise finance. The word ‘Vivriti’ means progress or development and speaks volumes about our passion to continuously strive for results that add value to our ecosystem. At Vivriti, we are mission driven, challenging the status quo each day, reinventing the Indian mid-market debt market space, and creating an industry in itself.

Over the last five years, the group that consists of two companies – Vivriti Capital, a unique enterprise fintech NBFC, and Vivriti Asset Management, India’s fastest growing digital alternate debt fund manager, has built significantly on its vision. Vivriti presently manages assets in excess of US$ 800 Mn, has offices in Chennai, Mumbai, Bangalore, Delhi and Jaipur, and consists of a high-powered team of 170+.

Why Join Us?

We are a high energy and supremely passionate bunch of individuals. This is a diverse group of people, who would be best in what they do, are diverse and inclusive, are collaborative and extremely hardworking. Indeed, a very inspiring peer group. This is a team with a shared goal of reshaping the Indian mid-market enterprise debt market and change lives of millions of people through our work.

We have a keen eye for great talent, have an appreciation for potential, and an environment which facilitates hyper-performance. Vivriti is known to present a platform to excel for those who have a desire to reach great heights in their career. We nurture our team with great care, encourage ambition, are compassionate in your failures and cheer your successes. We’re proud of our collaborative culture; everyone is ready to lend a helping hand, whether it’s your first day on the job or your thousandth.

Our Rewards mechanisms are aggressive. High Performance fetches non-linear Rewards. In addition to the fixed component and variable pay, we ensure long term wealth creation for our critical employees through employee stock options.

We invest in our employees through developmental programs, Professional Development Allowances and Education Grants.

Our Benefits are better than the best. To list a few below -

  • Medical Care, Life and Personal Accident Insurance, Critical illness cover
  • Interest free loans of up to INR 10 Lacs, with no questions asked
  • Promoting health and wellness at the office with a well-equipped gymnasium, indoor sports facilities and recreation room. Motivating through regular fitness challenges and sports events and leagues.
  • Caring for your health with nutritious food, fruits served round the clock, variety of beverages, etc.
  • Ensuring maximum fun environment through Vivriti Premier League – a cross-team collaboration championship challenge, which is a 10-month long series of sporting contests, recreation activities on the floor, cultural celebrations, etc.

Key Responsibilities:

  • To create an analytical framework for portfolio risk and returns, monitor and manage portfolio risk, create sector notes, track sectoral opportunities using digital data, create an early warning signal matrix.
  • Manage portfolio investments and operations for all offshore funds managed by VAM
  • Work closely with onshore team to screen credit opportunities and actively take part in the formulation, evaluation and articulation of appropriate private credit investment themes and strategies
  • Preparation of internal and external investment memos/communication on portfolio performance, investment opportunities, as well as investment themes
  • Independently handle end-to-end execution of new transactions and follow-on investments by coordinating with various internal/external teams
  • Active monitoring of portfolio performance through multiple modalities with a focus of creating and maintaining early warning signals/triggers for all investments. Proactively define and carry out corrective measures in the event of portfolio stress.
  • Conduct peer set portfolio/performance benchmarking and track industry developments

Desired skills and experiences:

  • Qualified as a CFA / MBA / CA
  • 8-10 years of experience in Credit funds, Wholesale financiers, Transaction Advisory roles.
  • Good grasp of domestic and international fund and tax regulations
  • Be brilliant with numbers, analysing financial data, managing and interpreting data and solving problems - to aid in taking investment decisions
  • Present / articulate / position an idea compellingly with strong oral and written communication skills
  • Be ambitious and passionate as we are and ability to work effectively under pressure.

Work Environment details:

  • Founder-led entrepreneurial set-up which is defined by speed, agility and creativity
  • Highly empowered and critical role, which makes a difference to Vivriti Capital
  • Young, energetic, and highly talented Teams
  • Hard work is the defining aspect of the organization

About the role:

The risk team is responsible for overall risk framework and strategy for the organization. The team develops various risk models, arrives at various sector reports from a risk perspective and provides in depth analysis and recommendation around risk profiles of various clients.

As the organization is embarking on the Retail journey, with greater geographical footprint of the clients, and lower average ticket size, the number of clients shall increase exponentially.

The Risk team shall have the role cut out in terms of robust diligence, analysis, faster TAT and ensuring nil delinquencies. Track record in

  • Credit appraisal or approval of Supply Chain Finance cases (Dealer/ Vendor) and SMEs as well as excellent knowledge of target industries channel’s behaviour
  • Experience in SCF Collections including process/ policy/ framework and implementation

Key Responsibilities:

  • Create and maintain optimal data architecture,
  • Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business needs
  • Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.
  • Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS ‘big data’ technologies.
  • Build analytics tools that utilize the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency and other key business performance metrics.
  • Work with stakeholders including Management, Risk, Business, Technology, Data Science teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs.
  • Create data tools for data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader.
  • Work with data science experts to strive for greater functionality in our data syst

Desired skills and experiences:

  • Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.
  • Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets.
  • Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.
  • Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.
  • Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.
  • A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.
  • Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores.
  • Strong project management and organizational skills.
  • Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.
  • We are looking for a candidate with 5+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information Systems or another quantitative field. They should also have experience using the following software/tools:
    • Experience with AWS cloud services: EC2, EMR, RDS, Redshift
    • Experience with data on server-based systems like Oracle
    • Experience with object-oriented/object function scripting languages: Python, Java, C++, Scala, etc

Founded in 2015 by a set of reading enthusiasts, Pratilipi is a storytelling platform which brings readers, writers and their stories together. Something that started as a reading platform we are now operating across three more products - Pratilipi Comics, Pratilipi FM, and IVM podcasts.

All the magic happens from a super cool office in Bangalore where we brainstorm, ideate, debate, and execute. Aggressive and fast paced, we motivate ourselves with meaningful disputes over infinite cups of tea.

Product Details:

  • Self-publishing Platform – 12 languages, 250K+ writers, 2.6M+ stories, 25m+ MAU, 1.7b minutes total time reading. We record 2M+ new followers, 5.5M+ new ratings, and 2M+ new reviews on the platform every month. We are larger than other Indian online literature platforms combined.
  • Pratilipi FM – Our stories are now in audio format across 8 languages, 5000+ Hours of Content, 100K MAU
  • Pratilipi Comics – Classic and in-house produced comics in 2 languages, 150+ Comic Series, 300K MAU
  • IVM Podcasts - Largest Podcasting Studio in India, with 3M+ listens a month

Our Engineering team works closely with the Product, Business and Data Science teams to build experiments & features that enable delightful experiences for our Users. Hence we fight a lot and party even more.

Our tech team consists of 25+ engineers who work in a high ownership driven environment, from fixing bugs to developing features to organizing stand up comedy shows in the office.

With an organization strength of 235+, we are looking for accountable engineers who fit into our culture and bring something new to the table, including party tricks.

  • You will be taking complete ownership of the iOS App development and delivery.

  • Fixing application bugs before the final release.

  • Excellent design sense

Expertise:

  • Swift/Objective C

  • MVVM, MVC, other design patterns
  • App Deployments

Are you sick of breathing poor quality air in our cities? Do you worry about climate change? Have you felt like pulling your hair on seeing a congested red route on the Google map?

Did you nod in ‘yes’? Same here, we did too! And so, we at Yulu set out to fix all of these issues by making our mobility smart, efficient and sustainable.

Being India’s leading shared electric mobility player with the largest fleet of EVs and biggest Battery-as-a-Service network, Yulu is reimagining urban mobility for a better future. Not only do we provide an affordable, sustainable and accessible commute alternative to daily commuters, but we are also making last-mile goods deliveries cheaper and green. Simply put, we are revolutionizing the way urban India commutes and consumes by building the Mobility 2.0 paradigm.

We are innovating at the intersection of consumer behavior, public policies, urban infrastructure, cutting edge technology, deep learning, product design, supply chain innovation and economic inclusion. Our proprietary mobility platform uses IoT, Machine Learning, and AI for vehicle access, fleet management, intelligent demand-supply management, and efficient operations. After 3 years of building a strong foundation for electric mobility, now, as we are ready to feverishly scale our business 10x this year and 100x over the next 3 years by working on many new, complex & BIG challenges on technology, data, product, markets, customer segments and growth, we still feel we are just getting started!

If our mission brings a spark in your eyes & if you’d like to join some of the most passionate people in the country who are committed to transform the cacophony on Indian roads into a symphony - Come, join the #Unstoppable Yulu team!!

  • Reviewing processes and implementing SOPs for on-ground implementation leading projects where necessary ensuring harmony with the five Yulu Operating Principles and the priorities.
  • Coordinating with the Central optimization and product teams for design and integration of R&M processes on Yuzen (Yulu operations app).
  • Keeping tabs on the latest developments in the city and spotting opportunities Yulu can leverage.
  • Hiring of R&M related staff, e.g. Mechanics, Yulu Pilots etc., addressing their training needs in coordination with the Learning and Development function, ensuring that all R&M staff abide by appropriate health and safety measures at all times.
  • Coordinate with other functional managers in the city and strengthen the profile of the R&M activity.
  • Identifying and raising various technical and other requirements to various central functions such as operations-design, technology, marketing, HR etc.
  • Using data to identify improvement areas, maintaining R&M dashboard and formulating plans to implement changes.
  • Reporting all R&M Activity status, progress and plans to city and functional heads.
  • Your performance will be measured on R&M cost (per: repair, bike, trip), availability of usable bikes, customer satisfaction index, employee happiness, the efficiency of the overall R&M activity operations.

  • Understanding of the domain, i.e. R&M, operations, logistics, supply chain, fleet management and mobility. Experience in EV is preferred.

If you are passionate about strategizing Business growth, aligning partnerships and operations towards bringing in that growth, are a self starter and are passionate about sustainable cities, we are looking for you! Business strategy and growth:

  • Work closely with the marketing team to increase user acquisition within Delhi NCR. Be a brand ambassador of Yulu in the region and be a key representative of the brand in the Delhi NCR region.
  • Understand and analyze demand patterns, strike partnerships that lead to revenue growth.
  • Strengthen relationships with the government bodies, public transportation entities, large real estate entities (residential and commercial) etc.
  • Be aware about the latest developments in the EV/mobility domain and represent Yulu's interest as and where necessary.

  • B.Tech from a premier institution. A masters/ MBA will be a plus but is not a key requirement.
  • Understanding of Delhi-NCR at a deep level and preferably a resident.
  • Entrepreneurial and data-driven decision-making approach.

  • Agility and ability to adapt quickly to changing requirements and scope and priorities.

title: lendingkartcareers - Lead Designer
subtitle: Location - Bangalore, India, Karnataka, India, Work Type: Full Time
content:
About the TEAM

  • Lendingkart is an online financing company dedicated to helping entrepreneurs and small businesses with working capital loans.
  • We use Analytics and Big data scoring to evaluate our customer’s business. We are a small and motivated team of bankers, data scientists, and techies trying to make a difference in the world of small business financing.
  • At Lendingkart we approach to design the way that we approach everything else. We love building great products, we love delighting our customers, we love turning the complexity of a chaotic world into the simplicity of a beautiful solution that truly solves customer needs.

About the ROLE

  • We’re looking for talented Product Designers to join us in our journey of reinventing Lendingkart. We have a groundbreaking vision for our product and exciting challenges to solve.
  • Each product team operates independently, with its own tech and common design resources. This not only allows for fast-paced development and pivots, it facilitates passionate, close-knit teams that work closely together to achieve their goals.
  • If you genuinely love what you do, are driven and passionate, then we want to hear from you.

What you’ll be DOING

We don’t follow the traditional corporate model, but empower our people to own their work end-to-end, that’s what you’ll be in charge of in the Product team: lead the product from a design perspective, having a holistic approach on the experience, from discovery to delivery – always keeping in mind our customers and their interests!

  • You will be partnering with the Product Owners, Engineers, Data Scientists, and other colleagues, working in a cross-functional and distributed team. Together, you will be actively involved in defining the customers’ and the business’ problems.
  • You’ll identify the key metrics for the projects you are involved in and take ownership for achieving their success.
  • You will research and bring forward new findings and learnings for reaching complex company goals – such as launching in new territories and offering new products.
  • From wire-framing to designing end-to-end flows and prototypes, you will be in charge of designing products that solve problems in a simple and elegant way while taking care of every small detail.
  • We love turning the complexity of a chaotic world into the simplicity of a beautiful solution that truly solves customer needs, thus you will be running user testing workshops and guerrilla testing
  • Once that’s done, iterate, implement with the technical team, and present the final solution during the design reviews;
  • We are not stopping here, we believe in continuous improvement, so you’ll review the performance of the release, identify learnings and find ways to enhance it.
  • To ensure we are speaking the same language as a team, we have the support of a design system – so you’ll kick in!
  • As a Lead Designer, you will have more responsibility around hiring, people management, and ownership of the product (or family of products) that you work on. You will also interact with our most senior stakeholders, and you will closely mentor a small team of Designers.

What you’ll NEED

  • 6+ years of experience in designing world-class complex commercial apps
  • A portfolio featuring examples of product design work
  • Strong design skills across Android and web platforms
  • The ability to think at a high level about product strategy and clearly articulate design decisions
  • The ability to understand technical implications in their design decisions
  • The ability to take ownership of design process and work as self-directed member of the development team
  • Strong UX focus and understanding of human behaviour
  • Clean visual design sense
  • Skills in typography and grids
  • Love to solve problems and be challenged
  • To be a constant learner. You will be always growing – both personally and with the team

Our PHILOSOPHY

At Lendingkart, we believe that working with people of different backgrounds and perspectives help us to elevate and build a better product for our users.

We’re committed to providing all employees with a work environment that celebrates individuality and remains free from any form of discrimination and harassment. We base our employment decisions on the needs of our business, job requirements, and applicants’ qualifications. In other words, we only care that you’re the best person for the job.

All the best
